amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for fossil energy research and development by $285 million and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for fossil energy research and development by $285,000,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 275 (Roll no. 246).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 275 (Roll no. 246).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Polis.
